title: What songs make you feel bad? - Quora

response.answer_text: Most pop and rap music makes me feel bad about the culture, if that's what you're getting at. Four chords, drugs, bitches, money… I expect a little more at these musicians’ pay grade. If you mean music that makes me feel sad, I can point you in various directions. After an unsuccessful romance I either listen to rock music to try to lift my spirits, in which case I run across things like “Do you love me now?” by The Breeders, “"I don’t love you” by My Chemical Romance, some Coheed and Cambria can be pretty melancholy… Or I listen to singer-songwriter types like Simon & Garfunkel or Bob Dylan, where there's a lot of wistfulness flying around (see “I Am a Rock”, “Wednesday Morning, 3 A.M.”, “Tomorrow is a long place”, and more). On the whole, these three are pretty jolly, treating some hard topics with an even, upbeat tone, but the above selections are not the only exceptions.

Interesting. I suppose I will expose a vulnerability through a song, because it won't make a difference here anymore. It's rather silly, but I keep strolling through those lanes of memory.
